nodes.text: Located on the Outer Rim planet Mustafar, Berken's Flow was the largest lavafall in the galaxy, as well as one of the few constants features of the lava planet.

Berken's Flow was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the seventeenth issue of De Agostini's Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon magazine, published around April 29, 2015. Berken's Flow originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it appeared in the 2003 Sony Online Entertainment massively multiplayer online role-playing game, Star Wars Galaxies, in its 2005 expansion, Trials of Obi-Wan.
